mapper.select: select distinct sys_menu.* from sys_user INNER join sys_user_roles on sys_user.id = sys_user_roles.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role_menus on sys_role_menus.role_id = sys_user_roles.role_id INNER JOIN sys_menu on sys_menu.id = sys_role_menus.menu_id where sys_user.id = #{userId}
with recursive menusTree as (select * from sys_menu where pid is null union all select node.* from sys_menu as node inner join menusTree as root on node.pid = root.id) select * from menusTree;
